Constructor Detail

TokenFilterContainer

public TokenFilterContainer()
Creates aTokenFilterContainer. A Container for TokenFilter. Every Token wich will be scanned are handled throught every Tokenfilter in this Container.

TokenFilterContainer

public TokenFilterContainer(ITokenStream tokenStream)
Creates TokenFilterContainer. A Container for TokenFilter. Every Token wich will be scanned are handled throught every Tokenfilter in this Container.

Parameters:
tokenStream - the token stream
